mapper.insert: insert into member_table (memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberAge, memberEmail, memberMobile) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberMobile})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPw=#{memberPw}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberPw=#{memberPw}, memberEmail=#{memberEmail}, memberMobile=#{memberMobile} where id=#{id}
